title: Get Games By SportId and Date Validate Games and GamePks
custom_preconds:
Must be running on NW with VPN access to the DB
Setup will grab a set of VwSchedule objects from baseball.VwSchedule view
custom_steps:
Sends a request to the schedule endpoint with a given date and sportId
Should return a Date Object with a number of Game Objects in a JSONArray
custom_expected:
Number of games in our JSONArray should equal the number of VwSchedule objects returned from the DB
Each of the gamePks in the JSONArray should be included in the gamePk fields from the VwSchedule model objects returned from the DB.

title: Get Games By SportId and Date Of Type Regular Season
custom_preconds:
Test must be run in an environment where DB is accessible over the network (or local).  VPN or FW opening is required.
Setup pulls VwSchedule model objects from the Database.VW_SCHEDULE table.
custom_steps:
Do a request to statsapi for the given environment using the parameters:
sportId = 1
gameTypes = R
leagueId = 103,104
hydration = team,linescore,flags,liveLookin,review,game(content(summary,media(epg)),tickets),seriesStatus(useOverride=true),broadcasts(all) (optional)
date = 2019-07-18
custom_expected:
VwSchedule List will contain games with all teams having sport ID of 1 for both home and away teams.
Date will, of course be 2019-07-18
The number of games returned will be the same in our response payload as in the List of VwSchedule objects.
League Id will match for home and away with the actual values in the VwSchedule object list.
